result.eng: Anybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.
result.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh Gaeilge mhaith ag an té a chaith an oiread sin ama sa Ghaeltacht
result.orig: Ba cheart go mbeadh Gaeilge mhaith ag an té a chaith an oiread sin ama sa Ghaeltacht
result.html: Ba cheart go mbeadh Gaeilge mhaith ag an té a chaith an oiread sin ama sa GhaeltachtAnybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart go mbeaḋ Gaeilge ṁaiṫ ag an té a ċaiṫ an oiread sin ama sa ĠaeltaċtAnybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.

result.eng: Anybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.
result.ga: Ba chóir go mbeadh Gaeilge mhaith ag an té a chaith an oiread sin ama sa Ghaeltacht
result.orig: Ba chóir go mbeadh Gaeilge mhaith ag an té a chaith an oiread sin ama sa Ghaeltacht
result.html: Ba chóir go mbeadh Gaeilge mhaith ag an té a chaith an oiread sin ama sa GhaeltachtAnybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċóir go mbeaḋ Gaeilge ṁaiṫ ag an té a ċaiṫ an oiread sin ama sa ĠaeltaċtAnybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.

result.html: Dhá oiread an airgidTwice as much money.
result.ponchtml: Ḋá oiread an airgidTwice as much money.

result.eng: She doesn't speak as much as you.
result.ga: Ní labhraíonn sí an oiread céanna leatsa
result.orig: Ní labhraíonn sí an oiread céanna leatsa
result.html: Ní labhraíonn sí an oiread céanna leatsaShe doesn't speak as much as you.
result.ponchtml: Ní laḃraíonn sí an oiread céanna leatsaShe doesn't speak as much as you.

result.eng: I haven't found a single mistake.
result.ga: Níor aimsigh mé oiread is botún amháin
result.orig: Níor aimsigh mé oiread is botún amháin
result.html: Níor aimsigh mé oiread is botún amháinI haven't found a single mistake.
result.ponchtml: Níor aimsiġ mé oiread is botún aṁáinI haven't found a single mistake.

result.eng: For a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ga: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.orig: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.html: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ponchtml: Níor ceadaíoḋ aċ correitilt sa tír go ceann seaċtaine eile agus ar ndóiġ ba ḃeag duine a ḃí ag iarraiḋ eitilt aċ oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.

result.eng: Nothing, not even a hedgehog, would be left unturned.
result.ga: Ní bhfágfaí a oiread agus gráinneog fhéir gan tiontú
result.orig: Ní bhfágfaí a oiread agus gráinneog fhéir gan tiontú
result.html: Ní bhfágfaí a oiread agus gráinneog fhéir gan tiontúNothing, not even a hedgehog, would be left unturned.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfágfaí a oiread agus gráinneog ḟéir gan tiontúNothing, not even a hedgehog, would be left unturned.
